smartDiscovery.title: Smart Discovery. Real Impact.
smartDiscovery.subtitle: Unlock Advanced, Contextual Search Capabilities For Your Enterprise
smartDiscovery.imageAlt: Professional showcasing AI search and discovery technology

features.title: Semantic And Natural Language Search
features.description: Enable users to search using natural language queries instead of specific keywords. The system understands the intent and context behind queries to deliver more accurate and relevant results.

details.heading: Contextual Understanding:
details.text: Goes beyond keyword matching to understand the meaning and relationships between concepts.

details.heading: Intent Recognition:
details.text: Identifies what users are actually looking for, even when queries are vague or conversational.

features.title: Personalized And Contextual Search
features.description: Tailor search results based on user preferences, behavior, and context to deliver highly relevant information.

details.heading: User Profile Integration:
details.text: Leverages user history, role, and preferences to customize search results.

details.heading: Contextual Awareness:
details.text: Considers the user's current task, location, and environment to provide relevant suggestions.

features.title: Multimodal Search
features.description: Search across different types of content including text, images, videos, and audio using various input methods.

details.heading: Cross-Format Discovery:
details.text: Find information regardless of whether it's stored as text, image, video, or audio.

details.heading: Multiple Input Types:
details.text: Support for text queries, image uploads, voice commands, and visual search.

features.title: Generative AI Search And Discovery
features.description: These systems use large language models (LLMs) to not only retrieve information but also to synthesise and generate new, coherent content based on the query.

details.heading: Retrieval-Augmented Generation (RAG):
details.text: This technique combines traditional search with generative AI. It first retrieves relevant information from a knowledge base, then uses an LLM to generate an answer based on that information.

details.heading: Conversational AI:
details.text: Powers chatbots and virtual assistants that can respond to natural language questions in a conversational manner. Instead of a list of links, the user gets a synthesized answer.

features.title: Hybrid Search
features.description: Combine multiple search techniques including keyword-based, semantic, and AI-powered search for optimal results.

details.heading: Best of Both Worlds:
details.text: Merges traditional keyword search with modern semantic understanding for comprehensive results.

details.heading: Adaptive Ranking:
details.text: Intelligently ranks results by combining multiple relevance signals and user engagement patterns.

advancedFeatures.title: Advanced Features Built For Modern Enterprises

mainFeature.title: Contextual Understanding
mainFeature.description: Your AI Search Engine Doesn't Just Match Keywords — It Understands Context, Intent, And Relationships Between Terms. Using Advanced Language Models And Knowledge Graphs.

items.heading: Accurate, Intent-Driven Results:
items.text: Reduces Irrelevant Results Caused By Keyword-Only Matching.

items.heading: Smarter Discovery:
items.text: Surfaces Related Content Users Didn't Explicitly Search For But May Need.

items.heading: Faster Decision-Making:
items.text: Users Spend Less Time Refining Queries Or Digging Through Results.

items.heading: Human-Like Understanding:
items.text: Handles Natural, Conversational Queries With Ease.

items.heading: Personalized Context:
items.text: Adapts Understanding Based On User History, Department, Or Domain.

faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.subtitle: Discover real experiences from clients who have benefited from our services and expertise.
